welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Spresiano, a charming town known for its beautiful architecture and delicious Prosecco wine. We hope you enjoy your stay and immerse yourselves in all that our city has to offer. Buon viaggio!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at S. Angelo Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marco Polo Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
